attributes.action: Government to intervene to force taxpayer owned RBS to save 10,000 jobs at Peacocks Stores LTD
attributes.additional_details: After being bailed out by the UK tax payer, RBS is pulling the plug on 10,000 of those taxpayers by pulling out of talks to save Peacocks store Ltd. As taxpayers, we own a part of RBS via the Government, so they should step in to help sort a deal
